backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two heart‑animation features and their associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files including sections, effects, hooks, and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining OKLCH Valentine color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, meta tags, and the React root with main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing hero, CTA, letter, reasons, footer, and optionally the question journey overlay.
frontend/src/components/effects/Confetti: DOM‑driven confetti animation generating particles with gravity, rotation, and continuous rendering.
frontend/src/components/effects/Floating: Floating and burst‑mode heart particle animation supporting origin‑based bursts and GPU‑accelerated transforms.
frontend/src/components/effects/HeartExp: Creates a burst of animated heart particles using manual DOM updates and requestAnimationFrame. Handles particle physics, fading, and cleanup.
frontend/src/components/effects/Sparkles: Generates looping sparkle animations positioned randomly across the screen using timed opacity changes. Renders sparkles via innerHTML on each animation frame.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing year, heart icons, and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays the main hero area with headline content, countdown, and a WhatsApp redirect button. Triggers floating heart effects based on button position.
frontend/src/components/sections/LoveLet: Renders a styled love letter card using content from valentineContent. Shows title, body text, and signature with decorative layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/Memorie: Empty placeholder file for a future Memories section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Questio: Implements an interactive multi-step question flow with music, animated effects, and playful 'No' button behavior. Triggers celebration animations and final reveal on completion.
frontend/src/components/sections/Reasons: Displays a grid of 'Reasons I Love You' cards with icons and animations sourced from valentineContent. Includes a decorative header and responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/ValentinesCountd: Countdown component showing time until Valentine's Day or a celebration message.
frontend/src/content/valentineContent.ts: Holds all Valentine’s Day content such as hero text, love letter, reasons list, and question journey configuration. Centralizes customizable text and media paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query. Recreates the actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundMusic.ts: Custom hook for loading, playing, pausing, and muting looping background audio with playback-block detection. Manages internal audio element lifecycle and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, error states, and access via a custom hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks with no current functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useValentinesCountdow: Implements a countdown hook that calculates time remaining until the next Valentine's Day and flags when the day is being celebrated.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, romantic theme styling, animations, and typography for the site's visual design.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugins for the site's styling system.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for the Valentine’s website build.
